official-title.#text:
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to allow
		  retail community pharmacies to deliver diabetic testing supplies to Medicare
		  beneficiaries.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#tail: , and in addition to the Committee on

, for a
			 period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for
			 consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the
			 committee concerned

short-title.#text:
Diabetic Testing Supply Access Act of
			 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Authority for
			 retail community pharmacies to deliver diabetic testing supplies to Medicare
			 beneficiaries

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 1847(a) of the Social Security Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
(through regulation, guidance, instruction, or
				otherwise) to restrict or eliminate an individual’s option of electing,
				regardless of delivery method (except by mail), to have diabetic testing
				supplies delivered to the individual by a retail community pharmacy (as defined
				in

), including a retail community pharmacy that contracts
				with a long-term care facility, assisted living facility, group home, or other
				type of residential setting recognized by the State. This paragraph shall not
				be construed as changing the amount of payment made under this part for
				diabetic testing supplies, but only as authorizing delivery of such supplies to
				individuals through retail community
				pharmacies.

text.#text:
Nothing in this section shall be construed
				as authorizing the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall apply to diabetic
			 testing supplies delivered on or after the date of the enactment of this Act.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 2845 IH: Diabetic Testing Supply Access Act of 2013
